channel.title: 🏢 University of Florida on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 University of Florida on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Taming Cross-Domain Representation Variance in Federated Prototype Learning with Heterogeneous Data Domains
item.description: FedPLVM tames cross-domain variance in federated prototype learning using dual-level clustering and an a-sparsity loss, achieving superior performance.
